issue.title: VMRC Package support for ROS melodic

content.raw:
Have you tried using the [Build From Source](#!/osrf/vmrc/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall) option?  We try to keep the default branch stable, so that should pretty low risk.

We have been focusing on new development and haven't put effort into supplying deb packages for the different combinations of Ubuntu and ROS, so no definite plans on when melodic packages will be ready for Ubuntu 18.04 - probably would need to wait until our next "release" which we are planning for March.
